alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 5:49AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Chinle, Kayenta and Page. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Chinle 1 to 2 inches Kayenta 0 to 1 inches Page 0 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
